content: In the starting position of the game, White has the rooks in a1 and h1, the knights in b1 and g1, the bishops in c1 and f1, the queen in d1, and the king in e1. Its eight pawns occupy the second row of the board, from a2 to h2.
translations: ita:Nella posizione di partenza del gioco, il bianco ha le torri in a1 e h1, i cavalli in b1 e g1, gli alfieri in c1 e f1, l
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
